paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician, A Psalm for the sons of Korah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician, A Psalm for the sons of Korah.

paragraphs.content: LORD, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.

paragraphs.content: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.

paragraphs.content: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?

paragraphs.content: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?

paragraphs.content: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shew us thy mercy, O Lord, and grant us thy salvation.

paragraphs.content: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

paragraphs.content: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.

paragraphs.content: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

paragraphs.content: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.

paragraphs.content: Yea, the LORD shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, the Lord shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.

paragraphs.content: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
